T_RDMI_COMPONENT_CONSTRUCTOR.DESCRIPTION:
The OTS_FILESYSTEM_DIALOG allows USoft C/S applications to open the Windows File and Folder dialogs
Method call Examples:
select OTS_FILESYSTEM_DIALOGS.Files('c:\temp\', 'Select a file', '"My Text Files (*.txt)|*.TXT|" + "All files (*.*)|*.*')
select OTS_FILESYSTEM_DIALOGS.Folders('c:\temp\', 'Select the folder to be used in this example')

T_RDMI_COMPONENT.DESCRIPTION:
The OTS_FILESYSTEM_DIALOG allows USoft C/S applications to open the Windows File and Folder dialogs
Method call Examples:
select OTS_FILESYSTEM_DIALOGS.Files('c:\temp\', 'Select a file', '"My Text Files (*.txt)|*.TXT|" + "All files (*.*)|*.*')
select OTS_FILESYSTEM_DIALOGS.Folders('c:\temp\', 'Select the folder to be used in this example')
